update.method: wget -q -O - 'http://www.ensembl.org/biomart/martservice?query=<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE Query><Query  virtualSchemaName = "default" formatter = "TSV" header = "0" uniqueRows = "1" count = "" datasetConfigVersion = "0.6" ><Dataset name = "hsapiens_gene_ensembl" interface = "default" ><Attribute name = "ensembl_gene_id" /><Attribute name = "affy_hg_u133_plus_2" /></Dataset></Query>' | awk -F "\t" '{ if ($2 != "") print }'

wget -q -O - 'http://www.ensembl.org/biomart/martservice?query=<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE Query><Query  virtualSchemaName = "default" formatter = "TSV" header = "0" uniqueRows = "1" count = "" datasetConfigVersion = "0.6" ><Dataset name = "hsapiens_gene_ensembl" interface = "default" ><Attribute name = "ensembl_transcript_id" /><Attribute name = "affy_hg_u133_plus_2" /></Dataset></Query>' | awk -F "\t" '{ if ($2 != "") print }'
sparql_csv2tsv.sh mbgd_organism.rq http://sparql.nibb.ac.jp/sparql > mbgd_organism.txt && sparql_taxon.rb query.rq http://sparql.nibb.ac.jp/sparql mbgd_organism.txt
sparql_csv2tsv.sh taxonomy.rq https://sparql.omabrowser.org/sparql/ > taxonomy.txt && sparql_taxon.rb query.rq https://sparql.omabrowser.org/sparql/ taxonomy.txt
